title: Physical Therapy by OneStep
description:
OneStep is a digital care solution powered by smartphone motion intelligence and equipped with all the tools needed to assess, treat, and monitor patients both in person and remotely. OneStep's comprehensive digital platform empowers providers with heightened visibility into patient mobility so that they can deliver the most precise and proactive care possible.

OneStep helps providers:

- Prevent falls and complications
- Strengthen documentation with objective data
- Improve patient engagement and outcomes
- Facilitate hybrid care models

OneStep helps patients:

- Stay motivated with immediate motion feedback
- Feel connected through seamless communication
- Play an active role in their care plan

Movement is a critical indicator of health. Leading organizations across the US are using OneStep to leverage mobility insight like never before - improving the care experience for patients and providers alike.
